front.title: IEEE Standard for Conformance to IEEE 802.16 -- Part 1: Protocol Implementation Conformance Statement (PICS) Proforma for 10-66 GHz WirelessMAN-SC Air Interface
front.abstract: This standard represents the Protocol Implementation Conformance Statement Proforma, per ISO/IEC 9646-7 (1995) and ITU-T X.296, for conformance specification of base stations and subscriber stations based upon the WirelessMAN-SC air interface specified in IEEE 802.16.
